summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 为使用自定义成员资格提供程序提供成员资格服务而实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 成员资格旨在使你能够轻松地为 ASP.NET 应用程序使用多个不同的成员资格提供程序。ASP.NET membership is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different membership providers for your ASP.NET applications. 您可以使用 .NET Framework 附带的提供的成员资格提供程序，也可以实现您自己的提供程序。You can use the supplied membership providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成员资格功能，请参阅 "[成员资格简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100))"，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/yh26yfzy(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 实现自定义成员资格提供程序时，需要继承 抽象类。When implementing a custom membership provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 创建自定义成员资格提供程序有两个主要原因。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom membership provider. - 需要将成员身份信息存储在 .NET Framework 附带的成员资格提供程序不支持的数据源中，如 FoxPro 数据库、Oracle 数据库或其他数据源。You need to store membership information in a data source that is not supported by the membership providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data source. - 需要使用与 .NET Framework 附带的提供程序所使用的数据库架构不同的数据库架构来管理成员身份信息。You need to manage membership information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 这种情况的一个常见示例是公司或网站的 SQL Server 数据库中已存在的成员身份数据。A common example of this would be membership data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site. 抽象类继承自 抽象类。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class. 实现还必须实现 的必需成员。 implementations must also implement the required members of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值存储在数据源中，其中包含相关的用户信息，以将用户与特定应用程序相关联。The property value is stored in the data source with related user information to associate a user with a particular application. 此属性是可读/写的，如果未显式指定，则默认为 属性值。This property is read/write and defaults to the property value if not specified explicitly. 由于成员资格提供程序为每个应用程序单独存储用户信息，因此，如果创建了重复的用户名，则多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以使用相同的数据源，而不会发生冲突。Because membership providers store user information uniquely for each application, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source without running into a conflict if duplicate user names are created. 另外，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定同一 来使用相同的用户数据源。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user data source by specifying the same . 在成员资格提供程序实现中，你将需要确保你的数据架构包括 并且数据源查询和更新也包括 。In your membership provider implementation, you will need to ensure that your data schema includes the and that data source queries and updates also include the . ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 采用新用户的名称、密码和电子邮件地址作为输入，并将应用程序的新用户插入到数据源中。Takes, as input, the name of a new user, a password, and an email address and inserts a new user for the application into the data source. 方法返回用新创建的用户的信息填充的 对象。The method returns a object populated with the information for the newly created user. 方法还定义了一个 `out` 参数（在 Visual Basic 中，可以使用 `ByRef`），该参数返回一个指示已成功创建用户的 值，或创建用户失败的原因。The method also defines an `out` parameter (in Visual Basic, you can use `ByRef`) that returns a value that indicates that the user was successfully created, or a reason that user creation failed. 如果已指定 事件处理程序，则 方法将引发 事件，并基于事件的结果继续或取消创建用户操作。The method raises the event, if a event handler has been specified, and continues or cancels the create-user action based on the results of the event. 您可以使用 虚拟方法执行指定的 事件处理程序。You can use the virtual method to execute the specified event handler. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回成员资格用户的列表，其中用户的电子邮件地址与所配置的 属性的所提供 `emailToMatch` 相匹配。 returns a list of membership users where the user's email address matches the supplied `emailToMatch` for the configured property. 如果数据源支持其他搜索功能（如通配符），则可以为电子邮件地址提供更广泛的搜索功能。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for email addresses. 返回的结果受 `pageIndex` 和 `pageSize` 参数的约束。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize` 参数标识要在 集合中返回的 对象的数量。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the number of objects to return in the collection. `pageIndex` 参数标识返回的结果页，其中0标识第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return where 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords` 参数是一个 `out` 参数，设置为与 `emailToMatch` 值匹配的成员资格用户的总数。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `emailToMatch` value. 例如，如果找到13个用户，其中 `emailToMatch` 匹配的部分或整个电子邮件地址，并且 `pageIndex` 值为1且 `pageSize` 为5，则 将包含返回的第6个到第10个用户。For example, if 13 users were found where `emailToMatch` matched part of or the entire email address, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, then the would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords` 将设置为13。`totalRecords` would be set to 13. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 采用用户名和密码答案作为输入，并从数据源中检索该用户的密码，并以字符串形式返回密码。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and retrieves the password for that user from the data source and returns the password as a string. 方法确保在执行任何操作之前 标志设置为 `true`。The method ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果 `false`，则会引发 异常。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 还会检查 属性的值。 also checks the value of the property. 如果 `true`， 将根据数据源中存储的密码答案检查提供的应答参数的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果二者不匹配，则会引发 异常。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. 如果自定义成员资格提供程序支持哈希密码，则当 属性设置为 `true` 并且密码格式设置为 `Hashed`时， 方法应引发异常。If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, the method should throw an exception if the property is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`. 无法检索哈希密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与 属性结合使用，以防止不必要的源通过重复尝试来猜测成员身份用户的密码或密码答案。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果为成员资格用户提供的无效密码或密码问题的数量大于或等于 所标识的分钟数内的 属性值，则将 属性设置为 `true`，直到通过调用 方法解除锁定该用户为止。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the property value within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果在达到 值之前提供了有效密码或密码答案，则跟踪无效尝试次数的计数器将重置为零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 无效的密码和密码答案尝试彼此独立地累积。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果将 属性设置为5，并在执行了两个无效密码答案尝试的情况下进行了三次无效的密码尝试，则必须在要锁定的成员资格用户的 内进行两次无效的密码尝试（或三个以上的无效密码答案尝试）。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the for the membership user to be locked out. 如果 属性设置为 `false`，则不会跟踪无效的密码答案尝试。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 无效的密码和密码答案尝试在 、、、和 方法中进行跟踪。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示成员资格数据存储中存储密码的格式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the membership data store.

value.span: 值之一，它指示数据存储中存储密码的格式。

span.span: One of the values indicating the format for storing passwords in the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示密码的存储格式。The property indicates the format that passwords are stored in. 仅使用 `Hashed`，`Clear` 和 `Encrypted` 是不安全的。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密码将使用单向哈希算法和随机生成的 salt 值进行哈希处理，并将其存储在数据库中。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 验证密码时，将使用数据库中用于验证的 salt 值对其进行哈希处理。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 无法检索哈希密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密码不安全，因为泄露数据库内容也可以公开加密密钥。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 这意味着可以对加密的密码进行解密和公开。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. 您可以使用 类的 和 虚方法来加密和解密密码值，也可以提供自己的加密代码。You can use the and virtual methods of the class to encrypt and decrypt password values, or you can supply your own encryption code. 如果使用 类的 和 虚方法，则使用配置中的[MachineKey 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100))元素中提供的密钥信息对 `Encrypted` 密码进行加密。If you use the and virtual methods of the class, `Encrypted` passwords are encrypted using the key information supplied in the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/w8h3skw9(v=vs.100)) element in your configuration. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 采用用户名和密码答案作为输入，并为指定的用户生成一个新的随机密码。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and generates a new, random password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 不保证 方法创建的随机密码在 属性中传递正则表达式。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机密码将满足 和 属性所建立的条件However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties 方法使用新的密码值更新数据源中的用户信息，并以字符串形式返回新密码。The method updates the user information in the data source with the new password value and returns the new password as a string. 用于生成随机密码的便利机制是 方法。A convenient mechanism for generating a random password is the method. 确保在执行任何操作之前 标志设置为 `true`。 ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果 `false`，则会引发 异常。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 还会检查 属性的值。 also checks the value of the property. 如果 `true`， 将根据数据源中存储的密码答案检查提供的应答参数的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果二者不匹配，则会引发 异常。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在 、和 方法期间引发。The event is raised during the , , and methods. 事件发生在请求的操作之前，并使用户能够继续或取消请求的操作。The event occurs before the action requested and enables the user to continue or cancel the requested action. 如果取消该操作，用户可以指定要引发的异常。If the action is canceled, the user can specify an exception to be thrown. 用户使用 事件处理程序为 事件指定处理程序。Users use a event handler to specify a handler for the event. 提供程序实施者可以使用 虚方法来引发 事件。Provider implementers can use the virtual method to raise the event. ## Examples 有关 实现的示例，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100))。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/0580x1f5(v=vs.100)).
